assetProfile.address2: 1st Floor Zone No: 69, Street No: 303 PO box 22504
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Qatari Investors Group Q.P.S.C., together with its subsidiaries, engages in cement manufacturing, security systems, marine and general services, financial services, and trading businesses in Qatar. It operates through Real Estate, Marine Services, Industrial, Contracting and Technology, and Others segments. The company offers clinker, ordinary Portland, sulphate resistance, blended, and oil well cements; and security systems, including fire alarms, fire sprinkler monitoring and supervision, central station monitoring, alarm.com interactive services, wireless/cellular monitoring, house audio systems, camera systems, card access systems, smart home/structured cable systems, telephone and TV cabling, business and home network wiring, and fire system inspections. It also provides marine services, such as container line, air and sea freight, custom and project cargo clearance, heavy lift movement, dry bulk cargo carriers, freight forwarding, and logistics; general services comprising architectural clabbing panel, space frame, tensile fabric structure, steel structure, and Kalzip system; and financial services, such as brokerage, investment and fund management, and management and marketing of shares and securities. In addition, the company trades in scoring system and scoreboards, airport and traffic displays, and display for all purposes and signboards; artificial glass for sports, landscaping, and golf; and supplies specialized rescue firefighting and aerial rescue vehicle. Further, it trades in construction materials, equipment, and trucks; provides information technology and contracting services; building maintenance and industry equipment works; and offers mechanical and industrial engineering equipment. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Doha, Qatar.
